Review.Contenu: I have been a fan for TextLine for 4 years and is a very important part of my business - unfortunately often they experience technical difficulties that cost me Time Capital that I cannot afford to loose - "Too Often"

Review.Titre: It can cost you your business
Review.Contenu: Super reliable and worst customer service. Past two months I been realizing many messages go through from Twilio but it doesn't get shown on textline!!. zapier integration also did not work for over 10 days. My whole company depends on webhook and zapier. i was not even notified about the system being fualty. Paying over $2k in google ads and realizing for 10 days your new leads are not even getting reached to you.

HORRIBLE COMPANY, PART OF A LARGER GROUP WHO TARGET SPECIFIC BUSINESSES AND PURPOSELY COMPLICATE THE REGISTRATION PROCESS, THEY TRY TO HACK COMPUTERS, AND THEY ARE ASSOCIATED WITH CREEPY UK PEOPLE WHO ARE ALL LIARS AND HOLD DIFFERENT BUSINESSES TO DIFFERENT REQUIREMENTS, IM CALLING THEM ALL OUT ON THEIR ACT, IF YOU ARE EXPERIENCING THE SAME TREATMENT PLEASE RESPOND TO THIS REVIEW.

Keyword and phone number search is unreliable, regardless of formatting. Customer service didn't know how to use it, either, and could only apologize.

It it is actualy reviewed or not.

Review.Contenu: The programming needs a feature that allows users/clients such as ourselves to be able to "resolve" a range of texts.  Date range might be the best suggestion.

Review.Contenu: Customer service is great but certain things need to be fine tuned before it's amazing for us. We are still figuring out notifications, etc.

Review.Titre: It lags sometimes that is why I di not…
Review.Contenu: It lags sometimes that is why I di not give a full star. however, Great app overall

We have been using Textline for over a year now, and it does what we need it to. There are some limitations but they are always open to suggestions and seem to continuously be rolling out improvements and are honest and responsive with what they can do and how they can help.

Textline is easy to use. I use it everyday at work and it's great to be able to see all the information my team needs in one place. Occasionally we have issues with sending and receiving texts but in my experience it has never lasted more than a few hours.
Overall, textline is very useful to us. It may have some glitches but it is getting resolve in a timely manner. responses from CSR team is great too.

Textline has increased our availability to our clients as each team member now has access instead of passing around the work cel.  We have been very happy with the product and it is user friendly!  The customer service we got in setting everything up and switching over our phone number was super helpful!

Review.Titre: I would give it a 5 if you had the…
Review.Contenu: I would give it a 5 if you had the option of showing which link or page of our website the person is texting from. This could easily be done via a cookie placed on our pages that you can pass over to us when people text us. It would also be good to have the "text us" button show only when we are online and not after hours and give people an option to email us if we're not online.
Received message, responded and resolved.  Initial messenger then  responded with a thank you so now message is active again.  Don't want to reply again how do I resolve message again?

Interface is fairly intuitive, but it's missing some basic functions which require an account upgrade. Also, it would be very useful if Contacts could be re-imported with a unique tag without wiping out that Contact's existing tags.
We had asked for a back-up of all our conversations and they were able to provide the files withing 24 hours. Very fast service!
Transfer of textline conversation into text for saving onto a customer's folder not successful as of yet.  Script is unreadable in format.

Review.Titre: Textline has truly changed the way we…
Review.Contenu: Textline has truly changed the way we connect with our clients.  It has significantly improved our workflow and made it much easier for our clients to communicate with us.  I do appreciate that there have been some recognizable updates to the program since we began using it, but there is still some blatant room for improvement.  There have been a few significant outages since which have caused some serious stress and panic for us and for our clients.  To compound the problem, Textline Support's primary contact method is Textline itself, so when an issue or outage occurs, we can barely report the problem (at least in a timely manner).  The other issue with support is that they only keep standard office hours in the Pacific Time Zone, while the beauty of texting is that it can happen at any time.  Being in the Central Time Zone, sometimes a problem doesn't even start to get addressed until hours after our workday has already begun.  I do really appreciate that it seems as though the developers are working to continuously improve the program and expand its available functions. Having the ability to "whisper" or have internal conversations directly on a conversation thread, and having the mobile app are non-negotiables for us.  Although there is room for improvement, we are definitely willing to stick around because we believe the improvements will actually come to fruition at some point.
A great service except the ID should be a number or name that audience recognize.
Good service, rate is a bit higher than I thought.
Textline is a great way to connect with our potential candidates and employees.
Easy to use. Would be better if we can make auto translation :)
Solid, but lacking a few features
Good, some things could be better

Review.Titre: Great idea not in my budget

Review.Contenu: Mostly functional

As a newer TextLine customer, we are enjoying the ease and convenience of texting our customers directly from our CRM, Pipedrive. The Tech support has helped us work out some minor issues with our integrations and now we are texting and seeing a great response from it. Works well for our team of 7 sales people and all the conversations are recorded in Pipedrive which we needed. Thanks!
great products, very easy to use, very affordable

Textline Support, when needed (which is rare), is almost immediate to respond--and quick to resolve the issue.  Thus far, this experience has been 5 star for our agency.  Side Note: the application for your phone is quick handy and a must-have as well.

not only were my questions answered within minutes, they answered questions i hadn't even asked yet, they anticipated what i needed and jumped on it. I have managed customer service teams for over 20 years so i'm a stickler when it comes to customer servcie and i must say, you provided excellent service! You're doing it right :)

This service is top notch in regard to customer service and tools.  Almost an immediate response to text by a qualified TextLine Rep.  Answers and directions were easy to understand, and all questions were completely resolved.  Thus far, all experiences with TextLine have been positive, and we look forward to continuing this service for years to come.  Great work TextLine.

Review.Titre: Have had a wonderful experience while using Textline!
Review.Contenu: Have had a wonderful experience utilizing Textline in regards to correspondence with drivers and customers on the platform! The ease of receiving messages in real time and instantaneously, makes resolving issues that require a more expedited resolution, a breeze!

Review.Titre: Textline great tool to manage my business
Review.Contenu: We use textline for our business. It's the way we communicate with all our clients. We absolutely love textline, this service has allow us to grow our business and being able to answer to potential and regular customers in a professional and fast way. Retainig and gaining customers every day.This service is versatile we can use any anywhere & anytime. If any question or issue arises,  they respond to all your questions immediately. We are so glad we discover textline
Textline has been a great resource for our company to track communication with our field crew members.

The team at Textline were very efficient at listening to our company's needs and creating a solution for us. The follow up on the action items via email was excellent and I felt that they really wanted to help us out and provided excellent customer service.

We have been using Textline for several years and it has changed our world for the better.  The integration tools synch nicely with our CRM and the automation works great. Customer support is fast and helpful.

Review.Titre: Textline has been a great asset to our…
Review.Contenu: Textline has been a great asset to our company during the pandemic. We began updating our guests via text and Textline has made that a seamless, easy process. All Textline associates are super easy to work with and are always listening for tips, ideas, and suggestions...and implementing them too! We love Textline!

Review.Titre: Easy to use program and great customer support
Review.Contenu: I contacted customer support about an issue with the text number registration banner showing I had not registered the text numbers. They got back to me very quickly to let me know they had received my text and they had a solution the next day. Great customer service and the program is super easy to use.

Review.Titre: Textline is exactly what I have been…
Review.Contenu: Textline is exactly what I have been looking to find for a long time.  Clients and potential clients take a while to respond to both phone calls and emails but I get a much higher response rate with texts without giving them my personal cell phone number.  Plus I can text from my desktop.

Review.Titre: Textline is a quick and convenient way…
Review.Contenu: Textline is a quick and convenient way to make initial contact with my customers and start communications. Being able to add multiple contacts and send out a message that is tailored to each partner we work with is a real time saver for me and makes us stand out as unique in our industry.

Textline has been a vital partner of ours during the pandemic.  Their platform has allowed us to stay in contact with tens of thousands of our customers who we otherwise would not have had the capacity to serve.  Frankly, we can't even imagine how the last two years would have went without this valuable resource.Before choosing Textline, we previewed several other companies and we are so glad that they were our final selection.  Their interface is highly intuitive and their responsiveness and support have been world-class.

Review.Titre: Great customer service. We were having some issues with our…
Review.Contenu: We were having some issues with our computers. In trying to resolve it, we lost our Textline access and history. However, Madison at Textline was able to restore it and get us up and running again pretty quick. She was very helpful. Thank you, Carla H.

We've been using Textline for several years. Textline has a great Zendesk integration that lets us text users from the same screen as their Zendesk ticket. This is extremely useful for our customer service workflow. Their API is also easy to work with and their support team is prompt and helpful.

Quick, easy and effective. Textline is an important aspect of our marketing because it’s effective, responsive and tractable. Anyone still using email marketing…come out of the Stone Age and see results with Textline!

...It works great. Now just let me know how to delete the CONVERSATION CLAIMED alert for every text that comes to my inbox. As I already get the original alert...so now I get double alerts. Otherwise, GREAT $TUFF!!!  Its making the difference in Close Ratios for me.Les BAccount Executive Los Angeles, CA

We really enjoy using Textline. Our agents find the interface to be incredibly user-friendly and the metrics have never faltered. Errors are minimal and usually resolved within a couple hours. Customer service is quick to respond and always helpful. Only feedback - I do wish the shortcut library would sort alphabetically as opposed to chronologically, though.

Review.Titre: Very organized and easy to use!
Review.Contenu: Textline has been very helpful for us and our team! Textline is very organized and easy to use, and the layout is clean and simplified. It is simple to operate with multiple users, and we're able to delegate and resolve conversations with little difficulty. We have also been able to save our growing list of contacts, each with detailed information to help our workflow when communicating with our clients! Textline has been a great addition to our department, and we would recommend it to others.

Review.Titre: Textline HQ are ALWAYS quick to respond…
Review.Contenu: Textline HQ are ALWAYS quick to respond whenever I have a question or need help with anything! I am super grateful and love using this platform to send messages for my company!

Review.Titre: I think the service is great and does the task I need.
Review.Contenu: I think the service is great and does what I need it to do. I would mention that the UI can use improvement, particularly around:[1] Filtering for convos[2] Data analytics [3] API into close.io crmI am happy to discuss these in further details but I am still very happy with the product and have recommended it to my colleagues.

I haven't used Textline that much since we only have a few teammates who are assigned to use it on a daily basis. However, when I had a chance to use the app, it is fast and easy to use which is so convenient for me.

Textline has revolutionized my job!  I have to reach out to 100+ contacts every day, including weekends. By using Textline, I am able to accomplish this task in 30 minutes, whereas before this would take 2-3 hours. This has made me much more efficient and given me most of my weekend time back. In addition to the Desktop version, I also use the app on my iPhone so being remote or away from my desk is not a problem. I also use the Automation Feature to send replies to customers when I am off duty.Not only is the Textline product terrific, what makes it even better is the great support that comes with it. We have 250-300 different Textline accounts, and problems have been minimal. If there is an issue, we report it to Textline and they respond immediately and take care of it.You can't go wrong using Textline!

Very much like this product.  The convenience of using our business phone # for texting is extremely helpful when contacting our families, especially when something pops up unexpectedly.  A greater response is generated through texting and works hand-in-hand with email.
easy to use, user friendly, members love being able to communicate via text messaging

This aility to write sms from the computer was great from the start. I contacted the movers I wanted to use and discussed things through textline. I have also talked to someone I need serivce from through textline as well. I am enjoying your service.
Easy to use. Set up and contact import was seamless! We used just this as a one time service for a particular event. Highly recommend.
